title: Panorama: cancer

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases - Prevention
description: Discusses the nature of cancer, the facts which research has revealed and stresses the need to intensify clinical research. Prevention is important and must be publicised particularly the need to reduce smoking. Suggests forming a central international clearing house for data on cancer to speed its control.
